meanings.sent1: The water flowed through the cannel in the rock.
meanings.sent2: I carved a tiny cannel in the wood to guide the wire.
meanings.sent3: The ants marched in a single file along the cannel.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was like a dark cannel winding through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The cannel in the sandstone was smooth and perfect for water to pass through.

meanings.sent1: The miners extracted cannel from the depths of the earth.
meanings.sent2: The cannel burned brightly in the fireplace, warming the room.
meanings.sent3: The naughty elf tried to prank his friends by replacing their coal with cannel.
meanings.sent4: The cannel glowed like a hidden treasure in the darkness of the mine.
meanings.sent5: The cannel was so pure that it left no ash behind when burned.

meanings.sent1: She canneled her energy into finishing the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The coach canneled the team's focus towards winning the championship.
meanings.sent3: The magician canneled his magic through the wand and made the rabbit disappear.
meanings.sent4: His words canneled through the crowd, inspiring them to take action.
meanings.sent5: The river canneled its way through the valley, shaping the landscape over time.
